item.description:
Standish Humane Society is holding it's annual fund raiser --
Folk & Furfest / Walk for Animals at Wompatuck Park in Hingham on Sunday, Sept 19, 2010.

New England Thunder volunteers to be there with our bikes. We allow people and pets to have their pictures taken on our bikes for a donation to the Humane Society.

Bring a folding chair, some snacks and drinks. I will have a cooler with some extra soda and water. Some food sold there. We will be there approx 12 to 2 pm...........


This is a good community event and and also good promotion for our club !

Meet for breakfast before the event.

Meeting place: Panera Bread
100 Derby St Hingham

Meeting time: 830 am

Ride to Breakfast: 9 am

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Pictures for Paws
